TopicTitle: Konstruction 0.2.2.0 a little help with magnets

Articles.Content:
was playing around with this today and i have a few questions.

whats the weight limit for the crane magnet, and the big magnets respectively, and what parts are/arent magnetic? 

and also is their any way to stop my vehicle from doing a flip when i  retract the legs?

Best place to ask this is in either the Konstruction or MKS threads - those are the relevant threads for this mod, and you'll get the most common user's attention best that way.

That said: Basically everything's magnetic.  I don't think that there's an exclusion there.  As for a weight limit - good question.  I was going to say 'depends on the local gravity' but you didn't ask mass, you asked weight, and that's the right term. 

And for stopping your vehicle from doing a flip - we'd have to see the vehicle.  I've had no problem, so it's probably a design/use issue.

Alright  thanks, didn't  want  to  get  all  my  stuff  to  the  mun  to  find  out  its  not  going  to  work  the  way  I  intend.

Ill  get  pictures  of  my  vessel after  work.

EDIT: its after work.

instead of a picture i have a video

and also how do i actually get things to stick to the magnet? when i try to pick up an evelon it just shoots off in a random direction away from the magnet, as if it had an opposite magnetic pole or something.
